## Description {#details}

===- <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/droppedvariablestats-h">DroppedVariableStats.h</a> - Opt Diagnostics -&#42;- C++ -&#42;-------------—===//

Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. See <a href="https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt">https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt</a> for license information. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

Dropped Variable Statistics for Debug Information. Reports any number of #dbg&#95;value that get dropped due to an optimization pass.

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find an Instruction that shares the same scope as the dropped #dbg&#95;value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or has a scope that is the child of the scope of the #dbg&#95;value, and has</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// an inlinedAt equal to the inlinedAt of the #dbg&#95;value or it&#39;s inlinedAt</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain contains the inlinedAt of the #dbg&#95;value, if such an Instruction is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// found, debug information is dropped.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if \\p Scope is the same as \\p DbgValScope or a child scope of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\p DbgValScope, return false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isScopeChildOfOrEqualTo(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/discope">DIScope</a> &#42;Scope,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Scope != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.find(Scope) == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.end()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">        Scope = Scope-&gt;getScope();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/droppedvariablestats/#a07e15724976aed7adc5b3a178548ca77">VisitedScope</a>.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if \\p InlinedAt is the same as \\p DbgValInlinedAt or part of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the InlinedAt chain, return false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aarch64packey/#abf4394f452bde3f544999858d71e4b46aaf2ff1a10f3f3b211d7781a33e4c1e05">IA</a> = InlinedAt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
